Hymn.Arabic: وَلَمَّا ابْتَدَ أَ يَسُوعُ كَانَ لَهُ نَحْوُ ثَلاَثِينَ سَنَة وَهُوَ عَلَى مَا كَانَ يُظَنُّ ابْنَ يُوسُفَ بْنِ هَالِي.
Hymn.English: 23 Now Jesus himself was about thirty years old when he began his ministry. He was the son, so it was thought, of Joseph, the son of Heli,

Hymn.Arabic: بْنِ مَتْثَاتَ بْنِ لاَوِي بْنِ مَلْكِي بْنِ يَنَّا بْنِ يُوسُفَ .
Hymn.English: 24 the son of Matthat, the son of Levi, the son of Melki, the son of Jannai, the son of Joseph,

Hymn.Arabic: بْنِ مَتَّاثِيَا بْنِ عَامُوصَ بْنِ نَاحُومَ بْنِ حَسْلِي بْنِ نَجَّاي .ِ
Hymn.English: 25 the son of Mattathias, the son of Amos, the son of Nahum, the son of Esli, the son of Naggai,

Hymn.Arabic: بْنِ مَآثَ بْنِ مَتَّاثِيَا بْنِ شِمْعِي بْنِ يُوسُفَ بْنِ يَهُوذَا.
Hymn.English: 26 the son of Maath, the son of Mattathias, the son of Semein,the son of Josek, the son of Joda,

Hymn.Arabic: بْنِ يُوحَنَّا بْنِ رِيسَا بْنِ زَرُبَّابِلَ بْنِ شَألَْتِئِيلَ بْنِ نِيرِي.
Hymn.English: 27 the son of Joanan, the son of Rhesa, the son of Zerubbabel, the son of Shealtiel, the son of Neri,

Hymn.Arabic: بْنِ مَلْكِي بْنِ أَ دي بْنِ قُصَمَ بْنِ أَلْمُودَامَ بْنِ عِيرِ .
Hymn.English: 28 the son of Melki,the son of Addi, the son of Cosam,the son of Elmadam, the son of Er,

Hymn.Arabic: بْنِ يُوسِي بْنِ أَلِيعَازَرَ بْنِ يُورِيمَ بْنِ مَتْثَاتَ بْنِ لاَوِي.
Hymn.English: 29 the son of Joshua, the son of Eliezer, the son of Jorim, the son of Matthat, the son of Levi,

Hymn.Arabic: بْنِ شِمْعُونَ بْنِ يَهُوذَا بْنِ يُوسُفَ بْنِ يُونَانَ بْنِ أَلِيَاقِيمَ .
Hymn.English: 30 the son of Simeon,the son of Judah, the son of Joseph,the son of Jonam, the son of Eliakim,

Hymn.Arabic: بْنِ مَلَيَا بْنِ مَيْنَانَ بْنِ مَتَّاثَا بْنِ نَاثَانَ بْنِ دَاوُدَ .
Hymn.English: 31 the son of Melea, the son of Menna,the son of Mattatha, the son of Nathan, the son of David,

Hymn.Arabic: بْنِ يَسَّى بْنِ عُوبِيدَ بْنِ بُوعَزَ بْنِ سَلْمُ ونَ بْنِ نَحْشُونَ .
Hymn.English: 32 the son of Jesse,the son of Obed, the son of Boaz,the son of Salmon,[d] the son of Nahshon,

Hymn.Arabic: بْنِ عَمينَادَابَ بْنِ آرَامَ بْنِ حَصْرُونَ بْنِ فَارِصَ بْنِ يَهُوذَا.
Hymn.English: 33 the son of Amminadab, the son of Ram,the son of Hezron, the son of Perez, the son of Judah,

Hymn.Arabic: بْنِ يَعْقُوبَ بْنِ إِسْحَاقَ بْنِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ بْنِ تَارَحَ بْنِ نَاحُورَ .
Hymn.English: 34 the son of Jacob,the son of Isaac, the son of Abraham,the son of Terah, the son of Nahor,

Hymn.Arabic: بْنِ سَرُوجَ بْنِ رَعُو بْنِ فَالَجَ بْنِ عَابِرَ بْنِ شَالَحَ .
Hymn.English: 35 the son of Serug, the son of Reu,the son of Peleg, the son of Eber, the son of Shelah,

Hymn.Arabic: بْنِ قِينَانَ بْنِ أَرْفَكْشَادَ بْنِ سَامِ بْنِ نُوحِ بْنِ لاَمَكَ .
Hymn.English: 36 the son of Cainan,the son of Arphaxad, the son of Shem,the son of Noah, the son of Lamech,

Hymn.Arabic: بْنِ مَتُوشَالَحَ بْنِ أَخْنُوخَ بْنِ يَارِدَ بْنِ مَهْلَلْئِيلَ بْنِ قِينَانَ .
Hymn.English: 37 the son of Methuselah, the son of Enoch, the son of Jared, the son of Mahalalel, the son of Kenan,

Hymn.Arabic: بْنِ أَنُوشَ بْنِ شِيتِ بْنِ آدَمَ ابْنِ الله .
Hymn.English: 38 the son of Enosh, the son of Seth, the son of Adam, the son of God.
